title: Why I think accents should be nerfed.
body:
Let's say I'm watching a youtuber or something who has a british accent and they use a word that I've never heard before.

I find out what the word means and find a situation in which I can use it.

I say the word and everyone around me is like "What did you say? Did you mean " and it makes me look low IQ.

The linguists should patch this out, it's a frustrating mechanic.
